refnamediv.refpurpose: The interface for canvas item models.

row.entry: If the item can take the keyboard focus. Default value: False
A description of the item for use by assistive technologies. Default value: NULL

A short context-rich description of the item for use by assistive technologies. Default value: NULL

refsect1.title: Known Implementation
refsect1.para: goocanvas.ItemModel is implementated by goocanvas.Rect, goocanvas.Ellipse, goocanvas.Path, goocanvas.Polyline, goocanvas.Text, goocanvas.Image, goocanvas.Group, goocanvas.Widget, goocanvas.Table, goocanvas.ItemModelSimple

refentry.refsect1: Description goocanvas.ItemModel defines the interface that canvas items must implement, and contains methods for operating on canvas items.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.add_child

listitem.simpara: The item to add.
the position of the item, or -1 to place it last (at the top of the stacking order).

refsect2.para: Adds a child item to a container item at the given stack position.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.allocate_area

listitem.simpara: The area that the item originally requested, in the parent's coordinate space.
The area that the item has been allocated, in the parent's coordinate space.
The x offset of the allocated area from the requested area in the device coordinate space.
The y offset of the allocated area from the requested area in the device coordinate space.

refsect2.para: This is used by goocanvas.Table and other layout items to allocate an area to each of their children.
Note that the parent item will use a transform to move each of its children for the layout, so their is no need for the item to reposition itself. It only needs to recalculate its device bounds.
The x_offset and y_offset are provided since for the simple builtin items all they need to do is add these to their bounds.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.animate

listitem.simpara: the final x offset from the current position.
the final y offset from the current position.
the final scale of the item.
the final rotation of the item.

if the x, y, scale and degrees values are absolute, or relative to the current transform. Note that absolute animations only work if the item currently has a simple transform. If the item has a shear or some other complicated transform it may result in strange animations.
the duration of the animation, in milliseconds (1/1000ths of a second).
the time between each animation step, in milliseconds.
specifies what happens when the animation finishes.

refsect2.para: Animates an item from its current position to the given offsets, scale and rotation.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.ensure_updated
refsect2.para: Updates the canvas immediately, if an update is scheduled. This ensures that all item bounds are up-to-date.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.find_child

listitem.simpara: the child item to find.
The position of the given child item, or -1 if it isn't found.

refsect2.para: Attempts to find the given child item with the container's stack.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_bounds

listitem.simpara: A tuple containing the four coordinates.

refsect2.para: Gets the bounds of the item. Note that the bounds includes the entire fill and stroke extents of the item, whether they are painted or not.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_canvas

listitem.simpara: The goocanvas.Canvas

refsect2.para: Returns the goocanvas.Canvas

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_child

listitem.simpara: the position of a child in the container's stack.
The child item at the given stack position.

refsect2.para: Gets the child item at the given stack position.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_child_properties

listitem.simpara: a child goocanvas.ItemModel
property names as string
A tuple containing the property values.

refsect2.para: Gets the values of one or more child properties of child.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_item_at

listitem.simpara: The x coordinate of the point.
The y coordinate of the point.
A cairo context.
True if the "pointer-events" properties of items should be used to determine which parts of the item are tested.
True if the parent item is visible (which implies that all ancestors are also visible).
The item found at the given point, or None if no item was found.

refsect2.para: Gets the item at the given point.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_model

listitem.simpara: the canvas model, or None of the item isn't in a model.

refsect2.para: Gets the model of the canvas item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_n_children

listitem.simpara: The number of children.

refsect2.para: Gets the number of children of the container.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_parent

listitem.simpara: The parent item, or None if the item has no parent.

refsect2.para: Gets the parent of the given item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_requested_area

listitem.simpara: A cairo context.
A GooCanvasBounds to return the requested area in, in the parent's coordinate space.
True if the item should be allocated space.

refsect2.para: This is used by GooCanvasTable and other layout items to get the requested area of each of their children.
FIXME: This method is currently broken, it needs to be manually wrapped returning the bounds instead of True/False.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_style

listitem.simpara: The item's style.

refsect2.para: Gets the item's style. If the item doesn't have its own style it will return its parent's style.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.get_transform

listitem.simpara: The item's transformation matrix.

refsect2.para: Gets the transformation matrix of an item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.is_container

listitem.simpara: True if the item is a container.

refsect2.para: Tests to see if the given item is a container.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.is_visible

listitem.simpara: True if the item is visible.

refsect2.para: Tests to see if the given item is visible.
This entails checking the item's own visibility setting, as well as those of its ancestors.
Note that the item may be scrolled off the screen and so may not be actually visible to the user.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.lower

listitem.simpara: the item to lower item below, or None to lower item to the bottom of the stack.

refsect2.para: Lowers an item in the stacking order.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.move_child

listitem.simpara: the current position of the child item.
the new position of the child item.

refsect2.para: Moves a child item to a new stack position within the container.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.paint

listitem.simpara: A cairo context.
The bounds that need to be repainted.
the scale to use to determine whether an item should be painted. See visibility-thresold

refsect2.para: Moves a child item to a new stack position within the container.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.raise_

listitem.simpara: the item to raise item above, or NULL to raise item to the top of the stack.

refsect2.para: Raises an item in the stacking order.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.remove_child

listitem.simpara: the position of the child item to remove.

refsect2.para: Removes the child item at the given position.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.request_update
refsect2.para: Requests that an update of the item is scheduled. It will be performed as soon as the application is idle, and before the canvas is redrawn.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.rotate

listitem.simpara: the clockwise angle of rotation.
the x coordinate of the origin of the rotation.
the y coordinate of the origin of the rotation.

refsect2.para: Rotates the item's coordinate system by the given amount, about the given origin.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.scale

listitem.simpara: the amount to scale the horizontal axis.
the amount to scale the vertical axis.

refsect2.para: Scales the item's coordinate system by the given amounts.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_canvas

listitem.simpara: A goocanvas.Canvas

refsect2.para: Sets the canvas of the item.
This is only needed for setting the canvas of the root item, as the other items can get the canvas from their parents.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_child_properties

listitem.simpara: A child goocanvas.ItemModel
The properties to set as **kwargs

refsect2.para: Sets the values of one or more child properties of child.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_model

listitem.simpara: A goocanvas.ItemModelModel

refsect2.para: Sets the model of the given canvas item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_parent

listitem.simpara: the new parent item.

refsect2.para: Sets the parent of the item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_simple_transform

listitem.simpara: The x coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.
The x coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.
The scale of the item.
The clockwise rotation of the item, in degrees.

refsect2.para: A convenience function to set the item's transformation matrix.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_style

listitem.simpara: A goocanvas.Style

refsect2.para: Sets the item's style, by copying the properties from the given style.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.set_transform

listitem.simpara: the new transformation matrix, or None to reset the transformation to the identity matrix.

refsect2.para: Sets the transformation matrix of an item.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.skew_x

listitem.simpara: the skew angle.
the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.
the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

refsect2.para: Skews the item's coordinate system along the x axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.skew_y

listitem.simpara: the skew angle.
the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.
the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

refsect2.para: Skews the item's coordinate system along the y axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.stop_animation
refsect2.para: Stops any current animation for the given item, leaving it at its current position.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.translate

listitem.simpara: the amount to move the origin in the horizontal direction.
the amount to move the origin in the vertical direction.

refsect2.para: Translates the origin of the item's coordinate system by the given amounts.

refsect2.title: goocanvas.ItemModel.update

listitem.simpara: If the entire subtree should be updated.
A cairo context.
A GooCanvasBounds to return the new bounds in.

refsect2.para: Updates the item, if needed, and any children.
